price: 60. Koroosite marah finqi yan, ken ayróy kah xagnisimeenit. (woh Qhiyaamah ayró).
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
